name: Slime and then Slime again
description:
Entry for the 72nd TriJam. This game was made in 3 hours. The Theme this week is: Reincarnation

You are a slime. A result of a long abandoned experiment that has gained consciousness.

Whenever you die a new version of you will manifest itself nearby.

Try to find your way out of the abandoned labratory and towards freedom!

Source Code: https://github.com/TLochow/Slime-and-then-Slime-again
